Article.Title:
SORRY!
- AND -
Swablu is now a Raid Boss!
- AND -
Draco Meteor added to Dragonite on the Move Sets page.

Text.p: First of all, sorry for the down time. I have been running this site on a free hosting service, but found out that it had a traffic limit, which was exceeded on 17 Feb. I tried to upgrade, but there was miscommunication between the vendor and the company they use for handling transactions.

After 4 days of complaining, they cancelled my order this morning. (Not because of my complaining, but because the transaction company didn't sync with them.)
So, I redid the order, complained to everybody and they pushed it through in less than an hour.

It feels great to
finally
be back up!
Swablu can now show up as a Tier 1 Raid Boss so I have added it to the Raid Bosses chart.

During the upcoming Community Event, if you evolve a Dragonair into a Dragonite, it will have the charged move "Draco Meteor". As such, I have added that to the Move Sets page to allow you to see its DPS.
Also, you may see some enhancements here and there. ;)

Article.Title:
New Gen 3 Pokemon
- AND -
Enhanced Move Sets pages.
Article.Text:
The various pages have been updated to show the new Gen 3 Pokemon that were released on 9 Feb 2018.
(Sorry for the delay.)
ALSO...
The Move Sets pages have had significant enhancements:
Icons have been added to help you quickly see types and boosts.
The ability to apply filters to narrow down what you are interested in.
There is even an All Generations page. (If you don't mind the extra loading time.)
Take a look!
